<h2>Opening Shift Leadership — Firehouse Subs, Tsawwassen</h2>
<img src="https://cdn.sanity.io/images/czqk28jt/prod_fhs_ca/6f50def84fcdd61fd71918d97c53881f9e2e098e-1014x542.jpg?w=897&q=80&fit=max&auto=format" class="img-fluid rounded mb-3" alt="Firehouse Subs leadership"/>
<p>I lead the <strong>opening shift</strong>, ensuring the store is guest‑ready and safe, with focus on <strong>process discipline</strong>, <strong>clear delegation</strong>, and a <strong>welcoming front‑of‑house</strong>.</p>
